misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse is a familiar face around the Hector Trophée, known for his jovial nature and sharp wit off the course, and steely focus on it. Representing Tapiola Golf, Lasse has been a consistent presence at the tournament.
He is slated to make his ninth appearance at the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée title has eluded him, Lasse's dedication is beyond question.
In addition to his commitments on the course, Lasse also operates the Hector organization's digital media properties.
